header_description: Experience the next-generation app. Scan and install now!
android_step1: Step 1: Scan the QR code to begin the APK download.
android_step2: Step 2(Optional): For security, your phone is set to block the installation of apps from unknown sources. To proceed, tap Settings, and enable "Allow from this source."
android_step3: Step 3 (Optional): Allow installation from unknown sources by toggling the setting in Security.
android_step4: Step 4: Open the APK file you downloaded. Tap Install and follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation process.
android_step5: Step 5: Once installation is complete, tap Finish to complete the setup. You can now start using the app!
ios_step1: Step 1: Scan the QR code and open it in Safari browser.
ios_step2: Step 2: Tap the Share button in Safari to open the share options.
ios_step3: Step 3: From the share options, tap Add to Home Screen.
ios_step4: Step 4: Safari will show a new page asking for confirmation. Tap the Add button to confirm.
ios_step5: Step 5: The app icon will now appear on your home screen. Tap the icon to open the app.
